modName: Perfect Female Skeleton With Better Bow Position
summary: This mod improves the look of every female body in the game -- even without body mods -- while changing the way bows are equipped to look more immersive and realistic.
descriptionHtml:
Game: Skyrim
Mod Name: Perfect Female Skeleton With Better Bow
Version: 1.0
Contact Info: Messes With Wolves or DMvO1 on SkyrimNexus and Steam
Author(s): Messes With Wolves

Description: This mod provides a version of \"The skeleton of female models\" by Ning that has been altered so that \"sheathed\" bows are worn along the body (see screenshots.)

Installation: Download and extract archive to a temporary location.
Copy \"meshes\" folder and paste into your data folder.  Say yes to any requests to merge or overwrite.

Uninstallation: Navigate to data/meshes/actors/character/character assets female and delete \"skeleton_female.nif\"

Change Log: 08/27/2013 - Initial Release

Future Updates: Provide options for 1HD Weapons on Back etc.

Thanks To: Ning, whose skeleton I used as a base.  Credit for most of the skeleton goes to him, I only changed the bow position.
author: Messes With Wolves
